TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Semaphore extends System.Threading.WaitHandle
Public NotInheritable Class Semaphore Inherits WaitHandle
public ref class Semaphore sealed : System::Threading::WaitHandle

summary.span: 限制可同时访问某一资源或资源池的线程数。

span.span: Limits the number of threads that can access a resource or pool of resources concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类来控制访问的资源池。Use the class to control access to a pool of resources. 线程通过调用进入信号量方法，它继承自类，并通过调用释放信号量方法。Threads enter the semaphore by calling the method, which is inherited from the class, and release the semaphore by calling the method. 上一个信号量计数将减少每次一个线程进入信号量，并递增时线程释放信号量。The count on a semaphore is decremented each time a thread enters the semaphore, and incremented when a thread releases the semaphore. 当计数为零时，后续请求阻止，直到其他线程释放信号量。When the count is zero, subsequent requests block until other threads release the semaphore. 如果所有线程都已都释放信号量，计数是最大值时指定创建信号量。When all threads have released the semaphore, the count is at the maximum value specified when the semaphore was created. 没有任何有保证的顺序，如先进先出或后进先出，在其中被阻止的线程进入信号量。There is no guaranteed order, such as FIFO or LIFO, in which blocked threads enter the semaphore. 一个线程可以进入信号量多次，通过调用方法重复。A thread can enter the semaphore multiple times, by calling the method repeatedly. 若要释放的部分或所有这些项，线程可以调用无参数多个倍，或它可以调用的方法重载方法重载，指定要发布的条目数。To release some or all of these entries, the thread can call the parameterless method overload multiple times, or it can call the method overload that specifies the number of entries to be released. 类不会强制线程标识在调用或。The class does not enforce thread identity on calls to or . 它是程序员有责任确保线程不释放信号量次数过多。It is the programmer's responsibility to ensure that threads do not release the semaphore too many times. 例如，假定信号量的最大计数为 2 并且线程 A 和线程 B 都进入了该信号量。For example, suppose a semaphore has a maximum count of two, and that thread A and thread B both enter the semaphore. 如果线程 B 中的编程错误后，即可调用两次，这两个调用会成功。If a programming error in thread B causes it to call twice, both calls succeed. 信号灯计数已满，当线程 A 最终调用 时， 抛出。The count on the semaphore is full, and when thread A eventually calls , a is thrown. 信号量有两种类型： 本地信号量和已命名的系统信号量。Semaphores are of two types: local semaphores and named system semaphores. 如果您创建对象使用构造函数接受一个名称，它是与该名称的操作系统的信号量关联。If you create a object using a constructor that accepts a name, it is associated with an operating-system semaphore of that name. 已命名的系统信号量是整个操作系统，可见和可用于同步进程的活动。Named system semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, and can be used to synchronize the activities of processes. 你可以创建多个对象表示同一命名系统信号量，并且可以使用方法打开现有的命名系统信号量。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore, and you can use the method to open an existing named system semaphore. 本地信号量存在仅在您的进程。A local semaphore exists only within your process. 进程中引用本地 对象的所有线程都可以使用本地 mutex。It can be used by any thread in your process that has a reference to the local object. 每个对象是单独的本地信号量。Each object is a separate local semaphore. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建具有三个最大计数和初始计数为零的信号量。The following code example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 该示例启动五个线程，阻止等待信号量。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主线程使用方法重载来增加到其最大值，从而允许三个线程进入信号量的信号量计数。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每个线程使用方法以等待 1 秒，以模拟工作，然后调用方法重载来释放信号量。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 释放信号量时，每个时间显示前一个信号量计数。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 控制台消息跟踪信号量的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模拟的工作时间间隔都稍有增加，为每个线程，以使输出更易于阅读。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定初始入口数和最大并发入口数。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化未命名的信号量。This constructor initializes an unnamed semaphore. 使用此类的信号量的实例的所有线程都必须都具有对该实例的引用。All threads that use an instance of such a semaphore must have references to the instance. 如果`initialCount`是小于`maximumCount`，效果就像当前线程已调用是相同(`maximumCount`减去`initialCount`) 时间。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 如果您不想要保留的线程的创建信号量的任何项，使用的相同编号`maximumCount`和`initialCount`。If you do not want to reserve any entries for the thread that creates the semaphore, use the same number for `maximumCount` and `initialCount`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建三个最大计数和初始计数为零的信号量。The following example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 该示例启动五个线程，阻止等待信号量。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主线程使用方法重载来增加到其最大值，从而允许三个线程进入信号量的信号量计数。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每个线程使用方法以等待 1 秒，以模拟工作，然后调用方法重载来释放信号量。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 释放信号量时，每个时间显示前一个信号量计数。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 控制台消息跟踪信号量的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模拟的工作时间间隔都稍有增加，为每个线程，以使输出更易于阅读。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定初始入口数和最大并发入口数，可以选择指定系统信号量对象的名称。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries, and optionally specifying the name of a system semaphore object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化对象，表示已命名的系统信号量。This constructor initializes a object that represents a named system semaphore. 你可以创建多个对象表示同一命名系统信号量。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore. 如果不存在已命名的系统信号量，创建初始计数和由指定的最大计数`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the initial count and maximum count specified by `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果已命名的系统信号量已存在，`initialCount`和`maximumCount`未使用的尽管无效的值仍会引发异常。If the named system semaphore already exists, `initialCount` and `maximumCount` are not used, although invalid values still cause exceptions. 如果您需要确定是否已创建的命名的系统信号量，使用构造函数重载。If you need to determine whether or not a named system semaphore was created, use the constructor overload instead. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当使用此构造函数重载时，建议的做法是指定的相同的数字`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。When you use this constructor overload, the recommended practice is to specify the same number for `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果`initialCount`是小于`maximumCount`，并创建已命名的系统信号量，效果是相同就像当前线程已调用(`maximumCount`减去`initialCount`) 时间。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, and a named system semaphore is created, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 但是，使用此构造函数重载没有任何方法来确定是否创建已命名的系统信号量。However, with this constructor overload there is no way to determine whether a named system semaphore was created. 如果指定`null`或为空字符串`name`，创建了本地信号量时，就像已调用构造函数重载。If you specify `null` or an empty string for `name`, a local semaphore is created, as if you had called the constructor overload. 因为命名信号量是整个操作系统可见的它们可用于协调跨进程边界的资源使用。Because named semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, they can be used to coordinate resource use across process boundaries. 如果你想要确定是否已命名的系统信号量存在，请使用方法。If you want to find out whether a named system semaphore exists, use the method. 方法会尝试打开现有的已命名信号量，则会引发异常，如果不存在的系统信号量。The method attempts to open an existing named semaphore, and throws an exception if the system semaphore does not exist. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了命名的信号量的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore. 该示例创建一个最大计数为 5、 初始的五个计数命名的信号量。The example creates a named semaphore with a maximum count of five and an initial count of five. 程序调用三方法。The program makes three calls to the method. 因此，如果从两个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，则第二个副本将阻止在第三个调用。Thus, if you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will block on the third call to . 发布第一个计划，以便取消阻止第二个副本中的一个或多个条目。Release one or more entries in the first copy of the program to unblock the second. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定初始入口数和最大并发入口数，还可以选择指定系统信号量对象的名称，以及指定一个变量来接收指示是否创建了新系统信号量的值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries, optionally specifying the name of a system semaphore object, and specifying a variable that receives a value indicating whether a new system semaphore was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化对象，表示已命名的系统信号量。This constructor initializes a object that represents a named system semaphore. 你可以创建多个对象表示同一命名系统信号量。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore. 如果不存在已命名的系统信号量，创建初始计数和由指定的最大计数`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the initial count and maximum count specified by `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果已命名的系统信号量已存在，`initialCount`和`maximumCount`未使用的尽管无效的值仍会引发异常。If the named system semaphore already exists, `initialCount` and `maximumCount` are not used, although invalid values still cause exceptions. 使用`createdNew`以确定是否已创建的系统信号量。Use `createdNew` to determine whether the system semaphore was created. 如果`initialCount`是小于`maximumCount`，并`createdNew`是`true`，效果是相同就像当前线程已调用(`maximumCount`减去`initialCount`) 时间。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, and `createdNew` is `true`, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 如果指定`null`或为空字符串`name`，创建了本地信号量时，就像已调用构造函数重载。If you specify `null` or an empty string for `name`, a local semaphore is created, as if you had called the constructor overload. 在这种情况下，`createdNew`始终是`true`。In this case, `createdNew` is always `true`. 因为命名信号量是整个操作系统可见的它们可用于协调跨进程边界的资源使用。Because named semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, they can be used to coordinate resource use across process boundaries. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了命名的信号量的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore. 该示例创建一个最大计数为 5、 初始计数的两个命名的信号量。The example creates a named semaphore with a maximum count of five and an initial count of two. 也就是说，它包含着的线程的调用的构造函数的三个条目。That is, it reserves three entries for the thread that calls the constructor. 如果`createNew`是`false`，该程序调用三方法。If `createNew` is `false`, the program makes three calls to the method. 因此，如果从两个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，则第二个副本将阻止在第三个调用。Thus, if you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will block on the third call to . 发布第一个计划，以便取消阻止第二个副本中的一个或多个条目。Release one or more entries in the first copy of the program to unblock the second. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定初始入口数和最大并发入口数，可以选择指定系统信号量对象的名称，指定一个变量来接收指示是否创建了新系统信号量的值，以及指定系统信号量的安全访问控制。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries, optionally specifying the name of a system semaphore object, specifying a variable that receives a value indicating whether a new system semaphore was created, and specifying security access control for the system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数应用于已命名的系统信号量的访问控制安全性，在创建时，阻止其他代码的信号量的控制。Use this constructor to apply access control security to a named system semaphore when it is created, preventing other code from taking control of the semaphore. 此构造函数初始化对象，表示已命名的系统信号量。This constructor initializes a object that represents a named system semaphore. 你可以创建多个对象表示同一命名系统信号量。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore. 如果已命名的系统信号量不存在，它被创建使用指定的访问控制安全性。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the specified access control security. 如果命名信号量存在，则忽略指定的访问控制安全性。If the named semaphore exists, the specified access control security is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 调用方具有对新创建的完全控制对象，即使`semaphoreSecurity`拒绝或无法授予当前用户对某些访问权限。The caller has full control over the newly created object even if `semaphoreSecurity` denies or fails to grant some access rights to the current user. 但是，如果当前用户尝试获取另一个对象表示同一命名信号量，使用构造函数或方法中，Windows 应用访问控制安全性。However, if the current user attempts to get another object to represent the same named semaphore, using either a constructor or the method, Windows access control security is applied. 如果不存在已命名的系统信号量，创建初始计数和由指定的最大计数`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the initial count and maximum count specified by `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果已命名的系统信号量已存在，`initialCount`和`maximumCount`未使用的尽管无效的值仍会引发异常。If the named system semaphore already exists, `initialCount` and `maximumCount` are not used, although invalid values still cause exceptions. 使用`createdNew`参数，以确定是否由此构造函数创建的系统信号量。Use the `createdNew` parameter to determine whether the system semaphore was created by this constructor. 如果`initialCount`是小于`maximumCount`，并`createdNew`是`true`，效果是相同就像当前线程已调用(`maximumCount`减去`initialCount`) 时间。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, and `createdNew` is `true`, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 如果指定`null`或为空字符串`name`，创建了本地信号量时，就像已调用构造函数重载。If you specify `null` or an empty string for `name`, a local semaphore is created, as if you had called the constructor overload. 在这种情况下，`createdNew`始终是`true`。In this case, `createdNew` is always `true`. 因为命名信号量是整个操作系统可见的它们可用于协调跨进程边界的资源使用。Because named semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, they can be used to coordinate resource use across process boundaries. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用访问控制安全命名的信号量的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在名称为信号量。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果信号量不存在，创建与最大计数为 2 和访问控制安全性，将拒绝使用信号量的权限的当前用户，但授予的权限读取并更改信号量的权限。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果从两个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 捕获的异常，并且该示例使用方法重载来读取和更改的权限所需的权限打开信号量。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改权限后，输入并释放所需的权限打开信号量。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release. 如果从第三个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，它运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取已命名的系统信号量的访问控制安全性。

span.span: Gets the access control security for a named system semaphore.

returns.span: 一个 对象，表示已命名系统信号量的访问控制安全性。

span.span: A object that represents the access control security for the named system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用以下标志 （使用按位 OR 运算组合） 的组合来搜索权限： ， ，和。The method uses the following combination of flags (combined using the bitwise OR operation) to search for permissions: , , and . 用户必须具有权限才能调用此方法，而且信号量必须使用打开权限。The user must have rights to call this method, and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. 在本地信号量，访问控制安全性是不相关。On a local semaphore, access control security is irrelevant. 如果对象不表示已命名的系统信号量，此方法返回授予任何用户对所有权限的对象。If the object does not represent a named system semaphore, this method returns a object that grants all rights to any user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用访问控制安全命名的信号量的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在名称为信号量。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果信号量不存在，创建与最大计数为 2 和拒绝当前用户的权限使用信号量，但授予的权限读取并更改信号量的权限的访问控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果从两个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 捕获的异常，并且该示例使用方法重载来读取和更改的权限所需的权限打开信号量。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 使用获取的系统信号量的访问控制安全性方法。The access control security for the system semaphore is obtained using the method. 更改权限后，输入并释放所需的权限打开信号量。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release. 如果从第三个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，它运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: An object that represents the named system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法尝试打开指定的命名信号量。The method tries to open the specified named semaphore. 如果不存在的系统信号量，此方法将引发异常而不是创建的系统信号量。If the system semaphore does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system semaphore. 若要创建的系统信号量时尚不存在，请使用之一构造函数具有`name`参数。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 多个调用此方法使用的相同值的`name`不一定返回相同对象，即使返回表示的对象相同的命名系统信号量。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system semaphore. 此方法的重载是等效于调用方法重载并指定和权限，使用按位 OR 运算组合在一起。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定标志将允许一个线程进入信号量，并指定标志将允许线程调用方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to enter the semaphore, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用访问控制安全命名的信号量的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在名称为信号量。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果信号量不存在，创建与最大计数为 2 和访问控制安全性的拒绝当前用户的权限使用信号量，但该权限授予的权限读取并更改信号量的权限。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore, but which grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果从两个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常方法重载。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method overload. 捕获的异常，并且该示例使用方法重载来读取和更改的权限所需的权限打开信号量。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改权限后，输入，并将其释放所需的权限打开信号量。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release it. 如果从第三个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，它运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. remarks.format: ## Remarks `rights`参数必须包含标志，以便允许线程进入信号量，并标志，以使线程能够调用方法。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to enter the semaphore, and the flag to allow threads to call the method. 方法尝试打开现有的已命名信号量。The method tries to open an existing named semaphore. 如果不存在的系统信号量，此方法将引发异常而不是创建的系统信号量。If the system semaphore does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system semaphore. 若要创建的系统信号量时尚不存在，请使用之一构造函数具有`name`参数。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 多个调用此方法使用的相同值的`name`不一定返回相同对象，即使返回表示的对象相同的命名系统信号量。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system semaphore. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用访问控制安全命名的信号量的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在名称为信号量。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果信号量不存在，创建与最大计数为 2 和拒绝当前用户的权限使用信号量，但授予的权限读取并更改信号量的权限的访问控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果从两个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 捕获的异常，并且该示例使用方法重载来读取和更改的权限所需的权限打开信号量。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改权限后，输入，并将其释放所需的权限打开信号量。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release it. 如果从第三个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，它运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 退出信号量并返回前一个计数。

span.span: Exits the semaphore and returns the previous count.

returns.span: 调用 方法前信号量的计数。

span.span: The count on the semaphore before the method was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 线程通常使用方法进入信号量，并且它们通常使用此方法重载来退出。Threads typically use the method to enter the semaphore, and they typically use this method overload to exit. 如果引发的方法，并不一定表示与调用线程问题。If a is thrown by the method, it does not necessarily indicate a problem with the calling thread. 另一个线程中的编程错误可能导致该线程退出更多的时间比它进入信号量。A programming error in another thread might have caused that thread to exit the semaphore more times than it entered. 如果当前对象表示已命名的系统信号量，则用户必须拥有权利和信号量已与打开必须权限。If the current object represents a named system semaphore, the user must have rights and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建具有三个最大计数和初始计数为零的信号量。The following code example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 该示例启动五个线程，阻止等待信号量。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主线程使用方法重载来增加到其最大值，从而允许三个线程进入信号量的信号量计数。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每个线程使用方法以等待 1 秒，以模拟工作，然后调用方法重载来释放信号量。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 释放信号量时，每个时间显示前一个信号量计数。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 控制台消息跟踪信号量的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模拟的工作时间间隔都稍有增加，为每个线程，以使输出更易于阅读。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

returns.span: 调用 方法前信号量的计数。

span.span: The count on the semaphore before the method was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果线程已经多次进入信号量，此方法的重载允许整个信号量计数与一个调用还原。If a thread has entered the semaphore multiple times, this method overload allows the entire semaphore count to be restored with one call. 如果引发的方法，并不一定表示与调用线程问题。If a is thrown by the method, it does not necessarily indicate a problem with the calling thread. 另一个线程中的编程错误可能导致该线程退出更多的时间比它进入信号量。A programming error in another thread might have caused that thread to exit the semaphore more times than it entered. 如果当前对象表示已命名的系统信号量，则用户必须拥有权利和信号量已与打开必须权限。If the current object represents a named system semaphore, the user must have rights and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建具有三个最大计数和初始计数为零的信号量。The following code example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 该示例启动五个线程，阻止等待信号量。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主线程使用方法重载来增加到其最大值，从而允许三个线程进入信号量的信号量计数。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每个线程使用方法以等待 1 秒，以模拟工作，然后调用方法重载来释放信号量。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 释放信号量时，每个时间显示前一个信号量计数。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 控制台消息跟踪信号量的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模拟的工作时间间隔都稍有增加，为每个线程，以使输出更易于阅读。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is less than 1.

exception.span: 信号量计数已是最大值。

span.span: The semaphore count is already at the maximum value.

-or-

exception.span: 当前信号量表示一个已命名的系统信号量，但它不是以 权限打开的。

span.span: The current semaphore represents a named system semaphore, but it was not opened with rights.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetAccessControl (System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity semaphoreSecurity);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetAccessControl(class System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity semaphoreSecurity) cil managed
public: void SetAccessControl(System::Security::AccessControl::SemaphoreSecurity ^ semaphoreSecurity);
member this.SetAccessControl : System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity -> unit

param.name: semaphoreSecurity
param.span: 一个 对象，表示应用于已命名的系统信号量的访问控制安全性。

span.span: A object that represents the access control security to be applied to the named system semaphore.

summary.span: 设置已命名的系统信号量的访问控制安全性。

span.span: Sets the access control security for a named system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以仅在上设置访问控制安全性对象表示已命名的系统信号量。You can set access control security only on objects that represent named system semaphores. 用户必须具有权限才能调用此方法，而且信号量必须使用打开权限。The user must have rights to call this method, and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用访问控制安全命名的信号量的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在名称为信号量。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果信号量不存在，创建与最大计数为 2 和访问控制安全性，将拒绝使用信号量的权限的当前用户，但授予的权限读取并更改信号量的权限。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果从两个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 捕获的异常，并且该示例使用方法重载来读取和更改的权限所需的权限打开信号量。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改的权限，使用后方法，信号量打开输入并释放所需的权限。After the permissions are changed, using the method, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release. 如果从第三个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，它运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

returns.span: 如果命名信号量成功打开，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the named semaphore was opened successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不存在名称为信号量，此方法不会创建它。If the named semaphore does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要创建的系统信号量时尚不存在，请使用之一构造函数具有`name`参数。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果您不确定是否存在名称为信号量，使用此方法重载，而不是方法重载，信号量不存在时引发异常。If you are uncertain whether a named semaphore exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the semaphore does not exist. 此方法的重载是等效于调用方法重载并指定和权限，使用按位 OR 运算组合在一起。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定标志将允许一个线程进入信号量，并指定标志将允许线程调用方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to enter the semaphore, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the method.

exception.span: 存在该命名信号量，但用户没有使用它时所需的安全访问权限。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不存在名称为信号量，此方法不会创建它。If the named semaphore does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要创建的系统信号量时尚不存在，请使用之一构造函数具有`name`参数。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果您不确定是否存在名称为信号量，使用此方法重载，而不是方法重载，信号量不存在时引发异常。If you are uncertain whether a named semaphore exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the semaphore does not exist. `rights`参数必须包含标志，以便允许线程进入信号量，并标志，以使线程能够调用方法。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to enter the semaphore, and the flag to allow threads to call the method. 多个调用此方法使用的相同值的`name`不一定返回相同对象，即使返回表示的对象相同的命名系统信号量。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system semaphore.
